mapper.delete: DELETE FROM common_videos_table WHERE common_id=#{userId} AND videos=#{studentClass}
mapper.select: SELECT us.id, cu.classname AS personName, us.sex, us.age, us.person_user, am.name AS agent, (SELECT asu.auditPaht FROM audit_submitted_user asu WHERE asu.userId=us.id LIMIT 0, 1) AS contract, ct.type_name AS studentClass, us.status, us.create_time, us.update_time FROM user_submitted us INNER JOIN agent_management am ON am.id = us.agent INNER JOIN class_type ct ON ct.id = us.student_class INNER JOIN common_user cu ON cu.id = us.person_name where us.id=#{userId}
SELECT number totalQuantity,qty numberOfUse,rqty remainingOrder FROM orders WHERE id=#{ordersId} AND `status`=1
SELECT auditPaht,uId FROM audit_submitted_user WHERE userId=#{auditId}
